fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:

- Nutrition-related initiatives, such as those discussed at the EU platform for action on diet, physical activity and health

- Audio-Visual Media Services 
- Employment-related initiatives especially concerning the future of employment in Europe 
- Circular Economy 
- Animal Health and Welfare legislation including those related to the use of antibiotics in farming

goals__remit:
With more than 8,400 restaurants in 39 European countries, employing approx. Over 430,000 people and serving an average of 15 million customers a day, McDonald’s and its franchisees are dedicated to offering its customers a wide variety of high quality menu options at an affordable price which complement a balanced lifestyle. 
  
We aim to assist as appropriate European decision-makers and opinion-formers in making informed decisions and contributing to knowledgeable debates by sharing in transparent manner relevant information and our business expertise in areas of public policies where we are able to input usefully.
